Server management

Server management

Any server requires constant monitoring and maintenance - monitoring, backup, software update. Husky supports all kinds of servers: physical, virtual and cloud servers: Azure, AWS, Google Cloud. We also manage all types of server - file servers, SQL servers, mail and web servers, virtualization systems (Hyper-V, KVM, VmWare) and Operational Systems (Windows, Linux and other *UX).

Server monitoring lifecycle

Server Audit

We make server audit, analyzing hardware, network topology, performance bottlenecks, reliability and security.

Recommendation

Based on the results of the express audit, we make recommendations on hardware and software issues, backups.

Perfomance

Recommendations
are implemented.

Server monitoring

The server is put on monitoring and technical support.

The scope of server management services includes:

- Installation and configuration of basic software on the server;

- Performance analysis, tuning and optimization of OS, MySQL server and services;

- Regular software and OS updates.

- Configuring system security and security policy.

- Server monitoring, using different systems: Zabbix, CloudWatch, Prometheus, DataDog etc.

- Configuring backups;

- Writing or editing system scripts, task automation;

- Protection against DDoS attacks and anti-virus protection

- Remote system administration and consulting services;

- Development and management of clustering and virtualization systems (Hyper-V, KVM, VmWare);

- Load balancing between servers, configuring server roles for optimal performance.

- System log analysis to detect and prevent errors;
